verses.verse: And they <S%H3427>continued<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H758>Syria<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> ye <S%H3588>that<s%> Ramoth in <S%H7433>Gilead<s%> is ours, and <S%H587>we<s%> be <S%H2814>still,<s%> and <S%H4480>take<s%> <S%H3947><s%> it not out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> Wilt thou <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me to <S%H4421>battle<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead?<s%> And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I am as thou art, my <S%H5971>people<s%> as thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H5483>horses<s%> as thy <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1875>Inquire,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H853>at<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered the prophets <S%H6908>together,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5030><s%> about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> shall I <S%H2308>forbear?<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up;<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Is there <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5750>besides,<s%> that we might <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> him?

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> There is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah,<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H854><s%> whom we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> him; <S%H3588>for<s%> he doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%> And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H5631>officer,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4116>Hasten<s%> hither <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> having put <S%H3847>on<s%> their <S%H899>robes,<s%> in a void <S%H1637>place<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> With <S%H428>these<s%> shalt thou <S%H5055>push<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> thou have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H1980>gone<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> declare <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> let thy <S%H1697>word,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> like the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H4480>them,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, that will I <S%H1696>speak.<s%>

So he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4321>Micaiah,<s%> shall we <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> shall we <S%H2308>forbear?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, <S%H5927>Go,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H4100>many<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> shall <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7650>adjure<s%> thee <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> me <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H7535>but<s%> that which is <S%H571>true<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H113>master:<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> Did I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee that he would <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H7451>evil?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> thou <S%H3651>therefore<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> him on his right <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3225><s%> and on his <S%H4480>left.<s%> <S%H8040><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H6601>persuade<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> that he may go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> at <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead?<s%> And <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on this <S%H3541>manner,<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3541>manner.<s%>
And there came <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6601>persuade<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>Wherewith?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H6601>persuade<s%> him, and <S%H3201>prevail<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> thee.

But <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> went <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3895>cheek,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H335>Which<s%> <S%H2088>way<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>unto<s%> thee?

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> thou shalt go <S%H935>into<s%> an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber<s%> to hide <S%H2247>thyself.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah,<s%> and carry him <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H526>Amon<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7760>Put<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> fellow in the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H3608><s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> him with <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou return at <S%H7725>all<s%> <S%H7725><s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by me. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hearken,<s%> O <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of you.
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> I will disguise <S%H2664>myself,<s%> and <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> but <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> on thy <S%H899>robes.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> disguised <S%H2664>himself,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>his<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> captains that had rule <S%H8269>over<s%> <S%H834>his<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3898>Fight<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> nor <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> that <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And they turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him: and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> cried <S%H2199>out.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they turned <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H4480>pursuing<s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4900>drew<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> at a <S%H8537>venture,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1694>joints<s%> of the <S%H8302>harness:<s%> wherefore he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the driver of his <S%H7395>chariot,<s%> <S%H2015>Turn<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and carry me <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4264>host;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am <S%H2470>wounded.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5927>increased<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> stayed <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> at <S%H6153>even:<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> ran <S%H3332>out<s%> of the <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2436>midst<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

And there <S%H5674>went<s%> a <S%H7440>proclamation<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>host<s%> about the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his own <S%H776>country.<s%>
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And one <S%H7857>washed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> licked <S%H3952>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H2185>armor;<s%> according unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>
